content:
Open epic has a list of all the endpoints they have in the following url: https://open.epic.com/MyApps/Endpoints
I couldn't find anything like that in Cerner. Does anyone have a list of the endpoints which Cerner are the backend? All the providers they have.
Thanks!

I'll note that https://github.com/cerner/ignite-endpoints exists but FYI @Jenni Syed @Drew Torres it looks like this hasn't been updated in 3 years (and back then my review indicated that only a minority of the URLs worked).
At the time, those were the clients we had permission to publish, but we're working on getting it updated for the 21CC timeline since it's now required that providers publish their endpoints
also, any questions around the Cerner implementation can be posted to our google group: https://groups.google.com/g/cerner-fhir-developers/
